title: How to complete my BSc - Quora

response.answer_text: You can finish your BSc by finishing 3 years of your life. but, How you finished your BSc matters. Here are some have you cleared BSc with a good grade?have you enjoyed your course period?have you made enough friends for life?have you learnt something new about life, career and cleared any exam at the end?have you made choice of your life? (going for IAS or Masters etc..,)have you earned enough memories for life so that one day when you get old a spark of a smile should appear on your face when you remember one of the naughty incidents that you have done?some get the life partner tooo…
